name: localbrain
description: Access your LocalBrain knowledge vault from Claude Desktop with semantic search, file operations, and intelligent context retrieval
long_description:
LocalBrain provides Claude with direct access to your personal knowledge vault. Search semantically across all your notes, emails, and documents, open and read files, generate summaries, and explore your vault structure - all from within Claude Desktop.

**Features:**
- 🔍 Semantic search across your entire knowledge base
- 📂 Browse and open files directly
- 📝 Generate summaries of documents
- 🎯 Structured search with filters (dates, platforms, keywords)
- 🔒 Secure local-first architecture

**Prerequisites:**
- LocalBrain Electron app running (auto-starts daemon on port 8765 and MCP server on port 8766)
- Vault path configured in ~/.localbrain/config.json
